mapper.update: update alg_account set usr_sn = #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_bal = #{cashBal,jdbcType=REAL}, earn_bal = #{earnBal,jdbcType=REAL}, free_bal = #{freeBal,jdbcType=REAL}, free_set_time = #{freeSetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where acc_sn = #{accSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select acc_sn, usr_sn, cash_bal, earn_bal, free_bal, free_set_time from alg_account
